= Blocks =
The *MAIN_DLL_BLOCKS_SECTION* is _0x7A000_ (499712) bytes long and is formed by three distinct blocks:
 # The *[https://code.google.com/p/open-myrtus/wiki/GENERAL_INFO_BLOCK GENERAL_INFO_BLOCK]* (_128 bytes_) where the information about _the executable_ will be stored.
 # The *MAP_INFO_BLOCK* (_24 bytes_) where the information about _the mapped section_ will be stored.
 # The *MAIN_DLL_BLOCK* (_474986 bytes_) where _the decrypted dll_ stored in the *.stub* section will be copied.

=== MAP_INFO_BLOCK ===
The *MAP_INFO_BLOCK* is _24_ bytes long and is formed by 6 UINT32:
|| Position || Value || Known value ||
|| 0 || 0 || 0 ||
|| 1 || SectionPointer2 + BaseSectionPointer || SectionPointer2 + 152 ||
|| 2 || InSize1 || 0 ||
|| 3 || SectionPointer2 + BaseSectionPointer || SectionPointer2 + 152 ||
|| 4 || InSize2 || 0x79A00 ||
|| 5 || a5 || -1 ||

=== MAIN_DLL_BLOCK ===
The *MAIN_DLL_BLOCK* contains the main dll code.
